meanings.definition: Not able to be decided or resolved.
meanings.sent1: The choice was undecidable, causing much confusion.
meanings.sent2: The undecidable situation left everyone unsure of what to do.
meanings.sent3: It was undecidable whether to wear a hat or sunglasses to the party.
meanings.sent4: The undecidable puzzle of life's mysteries kept him up at night.
meanings.sent5: The undecidable nature of the problem made it impossible to find a solution.

meanings.definition: Unable to be determined or settled.
meanings.sent1: The undecidable outcome of the game left the fans on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent2: Her undecidable answer to the question puzzled the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The undecidable weather made planning the picnic a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The undecidable argument between the siblings lasted for hours.
meanings.sent5: The undecidable future of the project made everyone anxious.
